name: PowerShift
description:
Speed across the shadownet desert at speed in the minimalist, 2.5D retro racer POWERSHIFT

Test your reflexes in the time trial mode! Utilize your manual transmission to race around the track as fast as you can without crashing.

POWERSHIFT is currently in development with many new features in coming soon:


Campaign mode

A full soundtrack

Full controller and wheel support

and much much more!
